comments.content: Thanks, any chance you know the name of the sans font?

Some options: [Proteina](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064255/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mendoza-vergara/proteina), [Komu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064255/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dizajndesign/komu) A, [Duke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064255/http:/www.losttype.com/duke) Fill (/B is off), [Opeln2001](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064255/http:/www.dafont.com/opeln2001.font)
